title: PneuGlove
summary: PneuGlove is a pneumatically actuated haptic glove for simulating power grip in VR Environment.
By inflating airbags, it creates constraints on the movement of finger joints.

paragraph: PneuGlove is a pneumatically actuated haptic glove for simulating power grip in VR Environment.
By inflating airbags, it creates constraints on the movement of finger joints.
The course project from [Physical User Interface - Spring 2021, instructor: Prof. Geehyuk Lee]
